<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grit and Tenacity](/Feats.aspx?ID=3178) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 115 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Trigger**
You fail a Fortitude or Will save.

</column>

---

You call upon deep reserves of toughness and mental fortitude to power through an otherwise debilitating effect. Reroll the triggering save with a +2 circumstance bonus; you must use the second result.

<title level="2">Grit and Tenacity leads to...</title>
[Unshakable Grit](/Feats.aspx?ID=3196)
name: Grit and Tenacity
